method.name: sign

lead.p: sign â€” Check if the number is positive, negative or zero.

method.return: mixed. Integer (1, 0, -0, 1) for numbers or NaN for non number input.

example.heading: sign example
example.code: console.log(Math.sign(10)); // 1 console.log(Math.sign(0)); // 0 console.log(Math.sign(-5)); // -1 console.log(Math.sign(-0)); // -0 console.log(Math.sign('8')); // 1 console.log(Math.sign('string')); // NaN
